sections.heading: approval, defined.Application approval means authorization in writing issued by the Chief Water Officer to an owner who has applied to the Chief Water Officer for permission to construct, reconstruct, enlarge, alter, breach, remove, or abandon a dam and which specifies the conditions or limitations
sections.text: approval, defined.Application approval means authorization in writing issued by the Chief Water Officer to an owner who has applied to the Chief Water Officer for permission to construct, reconstruct, enlarge, alter, breach, remove, or abandon a dam and which specifies the conditions or limitations under which work is to be performed by the owner or under which approval is granted.SourceLaws 2005, LB 335, ยง 6;Laws 2025, LB317, ยง 272.Operative Date: July 1, 2025
